entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
